name: Grey Ghost
description:
This is a prototype made with Unity with the intent of implementing the basics of carrier warfare in 2D action genre where player directly controls his carrier task force.

Goals behind the prototype:

- See if carrier warfare can be made fun with 2D action player controller scheme and abstract mechanics.

- Figure out the best approach to codebase/Unity project architecture for such a game if it was to be moved into production phase.

- Test various art styles. See what better suits the project. Original options were: absolutely abstract art vs realistic art. Now, I dig deeper into realistic art styles.

Made by Nikita "L0ckAndL0ad" Machatov
